channel.title: Grsecurity in conjunction with AppArmor
channel.description: One question: I have been thinking about installing linux-patch-grsecurity2 from Debian repos. However, I am afraid that it might break apparmor work, or even stop the OS from functioning. Does anyone know if that would be the case? Also, would installing that patch be enough to improve somehow the security, or would it be necessary to go through a hard configuration process?? THANKS

item.title: Grsecurity in conjunction with AppArmor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is quite a security specific question that is not very specific to Whonix. As per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian you may get best answers in some more specialized places, see also https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support for some possible places.

Read full topic

item.title: Grsecurity in conjunction with AppArmor
item.dc:creator: GNUser
item.description:
One question: I have been thinking about installing linux-patch-grsecurity2 from Debian repos. However, I am afraid that it might break apparmor work, or even stop the OS from functioning. Does anyone know if that would be the case?
Also, would installing that patch be enough to improve somehow the security, or would it be necessary to go through a hard configuration process??
THANKS

Read full topic
